add.description: Adds a selfrole button to an existing message.

message_id.description: The ID of the message to add a selfrole to. The bot must be the author.

role.description: The role you want to use. Make sure the bot has a role above that role.

button_label.description: The text that should be on the button. If it starts with an emoji, the emoji will be used only.

modus.description: What should the button do? Defaults to "Toggle Role".

button_row.description: On which row the button should appear. Each row has a limit of 5 buttons.

button_color.description: The color the button should have. Defaults to "Blurple".

hide_count.description: Hides the number of given roles next to the label. This increases the max. label length by 4.

content.description: What should the message say? This overwrites the original message. Use "/n" for newlines.

channel.description: The channel the message ID is in. Defaults to this channel.

remove.description: Remove a added selfrole and its button from a message.

message_id.description: The ID of the message to remove a selfrole from.

role.description: The role you want to remove. This will remove ALL buttons matching that role.

content.description: What should the message say? This overwrites the original message.

channel.description: The channel the message ID is in. Defaults to this channel.

selfrole.invalidMsgId: The given message ID was not found in the selected channel! Make sure you selected the correct channel.
selfrole.notMsgOwner: I can only add buttons to my own messages! You can use `/say` or `/embed` to make a message.
selfrole.noPerm: I don't have the permissions to manage the selected role! Make sure my highest role is **above** the selected role.
selfrole.limitReached: The fifth button row of the selected message is full! You can select a row with space by using the `button_row` option.
selfrole.rowFull: The selected row is full! Rows can only have up to five buttons.
selfrole.preview: This is how the button will look like. It will manage the <@&{role}> role. Please press the button in the next 30 seconds to add it to the selected message.
selfrole.addSuccess: The button has been successfully added! [Message Link]({url})
selfrole.removeSuccess: All buttons that used the selected role have been successfully removed! [Message Link]({url})

module.description: The module you want to toggle

toggle_command.description: Allow/Disallow roles/channels/members from running a specific command.

command.description: The command you want to toggle.

get.description: Get a list of disallowed roles/channels/members for that command instead.

role_1.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_2.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_3.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_4.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_5.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

role_6.description: The role for which you want to toggle the command

channel_1.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_2.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_3.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_4.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_5.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

channel_6.description: The channel for which you want to toggle the command

member_1.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_2.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_3.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_4.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_5.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

member_6.description: The member for which you want to toggle the command

language.description: In which language should the boy reply?

toggleCmd.notFound: This is not a valid command!

list.embedDescription: No roles, channels or members are currently disallowed.

toggleCmd.isDisabled: The `{command}` command is disabled for all members. You can re-enable it by running </setup toggle_command:{id}> without specifying any role, channel or member.
toggleCmd.embedDescription:
The following amount of roles/channels/members have been changed:
||View all disallowed roles/channels/members by using </setup toggle_command:{id}> with the `get` option.||

language.embedDescription: The next messages will be in `{lang}`.
